text_block_list.text:
"Nationwide cherry blossoms are late in blooming"… 
All around the country, people slumped their 
shoulders at this news.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Aww… I guess we can't have our hanami party… 
And I was looking forward to it so much… uuuu～

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Don't let it get you down, Chiyo! I'm sure you can 
find plenty of springtime fun in other things.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So I ask you, what does springtime fun make you think of? 
Exactly! Sakura horsegirls!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Indeedily! The power of Sakura bestowed through our names!! 
With all three of us, I say we have about 3 million Sakura Power!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If we travel through the lands with that power we could 
very well be mistaken for the actual cherry blossom front!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
A smile would surely bloom on people's faces as they watch 
us — the Sakura front — run past, as if it were hanami!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
You're saying… the three of us should run around Japan, 
brightening everyone's mood? How wonderful!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, why don't we post about what we're doing on Umatter 
and Umatube? That way even more people can see♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What a great idea! I can say quite a few people 
actually happen to follow me on Umatter!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
So horsegirls will become the heralds of spring! 
That's lovely! Let's do it! We'll be the Sakura front!!

And thus the curtain rises on the three girls 
and their "Bakushin-style Journey of the Sakura Front"
